meanings.definition: A kiln for drying hops or malt.
meanings.sent1: The oasts in the brewery help dry the hops for making beer.
meanings.sent2: The farmer used the oasts to dry the malt before brewing his own beer.
meanings.sent3: The oasts in the countryside were always busy during the harvest season.
meanings.sent4: The warm glow of the oasts at night gave the farm a cozy feel.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the oasts filled the air with a toasty aroma.

meanings.definition: To dry or toast in an oast.
meanings.sent1: She oasts the grains in the oast to enhance their flavor.
meanings.sent2: The baker oasts the bread in the oast to give it a crispy crust.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally oasts the marshmallows too much, making them burnt.
meanings.sent4: The chef oasts the nuts to perfection, adding a delightful crunch to the dish.
meanings.sent5: The campfire oasts the marshmallows, turning them golden brown.
